normal.1: Performs up to 4 attacks that deal <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> to opponents in front of him.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro> to opponents in front of him after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Calling upon the might of Dendro, Baizhu plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Controls a Gossamer Sprite that cruises and attacks nearby opponents, dealing <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>.
description.1: After it performs 3 attacks or if there are no opponents nearby, the Sprite will return, healing all nearby party members based on Baizhu's Max HP.
description.3: Those in the medical field who can read true signs of illness from false ones may even cure people before any symptoms can show.

description.0: Enters the Pulsing Edict state, creating a Seamless Shield.
description.1: While in this state, Baizhu will generate a new Seamless Shield every 2s.
description.3: The Seamless Shield will unleash a Spiritvein to heal the active character(s) based on Baizhu's Max HP and attack opponents, dealing <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> under the following circumstances:
4: When a character is under the protection of a Seamless Shield and a new Seamless Shield is generated.
When the Seamless Shield's effects expire, or when it is shattered.
description.6: If one can perceive the heavens and the earth, defend your inner sphere against outside influence, and keep your mind clear, surely nothing can hinder you.

description.0: Baizhu gains different effects according to the current HP of your current active character:
1: When their HP is less than 50%, Baizhu gains 20% Healing Bonus.
When their HP is equal to or more than 50%, Baizhu gains 25% <dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</dendro>.

passive2.name: All Things Are of the Earth

description.0: Characters who are healed by Healing Holism will gain the Year of Verdant Favor effect: Each 1,000 Max HP that Baizhu possesses below 50,000 will increase the Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG dealt by these characters by 2%, while the Aggravate and Spread reaction DMG dealt by these characters will be increased by 0.8%. This effect lasts 6s.
When Baizhu is in the party, interacting with certain collectible items will heal your current active character for 2.5% of Baizhu's Max HP.
When Baizhu's active party member hits an opponent with their attacks, Baizhu will use Gossamer Sprite: Splice.
description.1: Gossamer Sprite: Splice can initiate 1 attack that deals 300% Dendro DMG and 20% of Universal Diagnosis' healing.
description.2: DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
description.3: This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Healing Holism by 3.
For 15s after Healing Holism is used, Baizhu will increase all nearby party members' Elemental Mastery by 80.
Increases the Level of Universal Diagnosis by 3.
Increases the DMG dealt by Healing Holism's Spiritveins by 10% of Baizhu's Max HP.
description.1: Additionally, when Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice hit opponents, there is a 100% chance of generating one of Healing Holism's Seamless Shields. This effect can only be triggered once by a Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice.
